original_text: and a letter to Asaph, the keeper of the king's forest, that he may give me timber to make beams for the gates of the fortress of the temple, and for the wall of the city, and for the house that I shall occupy.” And the king granted me what I asked, for the good hand of my God was upon me.
korean_text: 또 왕의 삼림 감독 아삽에게 조서를 내리사 그가 성전에 속한 영문의 문과 성곽과 내가 들어갈 집을 위하여 들보로 쓸 재목을 내게 주게 하옵소서 하매 내 하나님의 선한 손이 나를 도우시므로 왕이 허락하고

sentences.original_text: the keeper of the king's forest
that he may give me timber
to make beams for the gates
of the fortress of the temple
and for the wall of the city
and for the house that I shall occupy
And the king granted me what I asked
for the good hand of my God was upon me
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 내 하나님의 선한 손이 나와 함께 하셨기 때문이라
